transcript.text: hello and welcome to my channel true
reporting on this channel we discussed
topics the mainstream media won't talk
about or even touch true reporting is
for Patriots who believe in free speech
and truth if you would like to be more
involved in this channel I host a
nightly open forum call-in show from 8
p.m. to 9 p.m. Eastern Standard Time if
you would like to know when I post or
when I do my live streams you can click
the bell to get all notifications like
thank you for supporting true reporting
